extendedInfo.description: Woot! A fast Woot watcher for Woot-Offs and Daily Sales at Woot.com!Supported Woot sites include Shirt, Kids, Wine, Sellout, and now Moofi, Home, Sport,Tech and Accessories!WootWatcher Features:* Push notifications (That means lightning-fast updates and low battery usage)* No ads! Ads suck!* Highly customizable notifications* Excellent support (Your emails go straight to my phone)* Unparalleled protection from zombies and other dangerous creatures of the night* Big, high-rez images* I'm always working on a few awesome new featuresFollow me on Twitter: @WootWatcherBenNotes:Android's Move to SD feature is incompatible with some of the features of WootWatcher, so I can't enable it. If you're using a custom ROM that can force an app to be stored on SD, don't move WootWatcher to SD or you will have reliability problems.If you have any problems at all, let me know! Emails go straight to my phone.If you are getting the woot items but no images, check to make sure your SD card and phone storage are not full. This is the main cause of missing images, since WootWatcher doesn't have any place to put them.Reddit:treboniusNotice:I have recently joined Woot's "Minions" program, which is an affiliate program that helps fund WootWatcher development. Here's how it works: If you click a button in WootWatcher that opens the browser and takes you to the Woot.com site, it first goes to one of cj.com's tracking servers. That server places a cookie in your browser. If you end up purchasing something from Woot.com using your mobile device, that cookie is used to give me credit for sending you there. Woot then pays me a small percentage of the total cost of your purchase, except for stuff on Wine.Woot. If you happen to use an ad blocker on your device, it may block those links. Feel free to email me if you have any questions.Beyond the Woot.com Minions program, I have no official relationship or affiliation with Woot.

reviews.title: Best Woot Experience
reviews.comment: Great app, but could we change the app icon? It\'d be nice to see something a little more fitting for how nice the interface looks!
reviews.author: Trevor Michaud

reviews.title: Good with a few flaws
reviews.comment: It would be nice to be able to pinch-zoom on images. The real flaw is that when it can\'t update,  there is no indication of this ...you are just presented the old items
reviews.author: Matt Davis

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Sleek and easy to use ui. Push notifications, especially on woot offs, are a welcome addition. My only complaint is that I would like a better way to see what the woot plus items are. Perhaps listing the \"topic\" of the woot plus above the button?
reviews.author: Charles LeDoux

reviews.title: Quirky operation on Nexus 10
reviews.comment: When in landscape mode the item images are really small. I usually have to reorient to see larger images. Then recently the app would not rotate out of landscape mode.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app.  Feature rich, works well.
reviews.comment: Best Woot App I\'ve used.   Features all work as expected / advertised, notifications actually happen.  Even the sense of humor in the settings is great.  Someone has been reading the Jargon File.  ( :
reviews.author: B.J. Richards

reviews.comment: Best Woot app I have found
reviews.author: Keith Schweikhard

reviews.comment: Great app, frequently improved
reviews.author: Kellie Worcester

reviews.title: Frequent updates and good feature support
reviews.comment: Love the plus deal support, timely updates for new Woot sites, and push notifications. My only complaint is that the notifications waste space with generic text so that most of the the actual item text falls off the edge of the screen...
reviews.author: Jeff Colletti

reviews.title: 24 hours behind.
reviews.comment: Updates get better and better - my go-to app for Woot-off notifications!
reviews.author: Denise Dutton

reviews.comment: I love Woot!
reviews.author: Deanne E

reviews.title: 80% functional (except \"buttons\")
reviews.comment: When I want full WootWatcher functionality, I must turn on Galaxy Tab... as WootWatcher \"buttons\" do not work on Note 2 (no \"More Moofi Items!\"; none of the \"WootPlus!\" buttons). Recent update activated \"I Want One!\" button(!); all others open a blank page which never updates (Tab takes only a few seconds to populate list of items). If app on your device--especially the Galaxy Note 2--similarly fails to respond, PLEASE let developer (Ben) know.
reviews.author: Paul Mitchell

reviews.title: Doesn\'t update.
reviews.comment: Needs an \"update on open\" feature. I have to manually hit refresh a couple times to get app to update. They don\'t seem to know how to fix it, since it has always had this problem.
reviews.author: Mike M

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Easy to use and the customizable tabs are great
reviews.author: Andrew Craig

reviews.comment: A must for Woot offs!
reviews.author: David Wirtz

reviews.title: Thanks Ben!
reviews.comment: The self deprecation in this feature rich app is hilarious and endearing. Like woot\'s writers.
reviews.author: Adell Hanson-Kahn

reviews.title: Most actively developed app I have.
reviews.comment: Updates come almost too often, but they keep me from feeling like the developer is neglecting the app. It looks amazing. The ONLY complaint I have is that I simply cannot make the notification silent without my ringer on silent. It has been this way for several versions. Stock EVO LTE
reviews.author: Ian Zak

reviews.title: Woot woot
reviews.comment: Great app.  Updated as Woot! adds features within a few days of the update.  Now if it could automatically buy BOCs for me.
reviews.author: Andy Chaffee

reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
reviews.comment: This app does exactly what it says and looks great. I use this app as an alarm to tell me when to go to bed as it is very reliable.
reviews.author: Chris Mattern

reviews.title: Power hog
reviews.comment: Eats up battery life during a Woot off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Continues to impress
reviews.comment: Thanks for the quick update to add tools and garden. You rock.  This is easily the best Woot app around.
reviews.author: A Google User
